text: The world economy or the global economy is the economy of everyone in the world. This includes all trading that happens between people or groups of people such as nations."World Economy." â€“ Definition. American English Definition of with Pronunciation by Macmillan Dictionary. N.p., n.d. Web. 2 January 2015. In some situations, the two meanings can mean different things, with the "global economy" being measured differently from how people measure and look at economies by country. == References == Category:Economics
title: World economy
